name: The title screen became a puzzle
name_original: The title screen became a puzzle
description:
Easy puzzle from the title screens of my visual novel and rpg maker game.

The title screen picture from my VN is a background from Rachel Chen.

 One gift picture from Nora based on my VN ❤️❤️

Both title screen from my rpg maker game were made by Alexanda.

Free cover image from Lovepik.com

(I do not know if this can be played on Mac and Linux?)
